name: Nut on my watch
description:
Important

We've noticed the leaderboard sometimes print empty names all though keeping the scores, if this happen to you, tell us what score was yours and well put your name in manually. This seem to happen only when restarting a new game after a game ended, so update the itch-page and restart it between attempts to avoid this issue!

Thanks for playing!

Protect your nuts! 

The Gray Squirrels have been lazy all summer and are now trying to steal your hard-earned nuts from your oak stump before autumn arrives. Keep them away by throwing pebbles and boulders at them, but make sure you don't hit your friendly Red Squirrels who are searching for more nuts in the forest - or they will be knocked out and won't be able to help gather nuts for a while.

Controls:

A/D: Move around
LMB: Throw pebble / Boulder
RMB: Dig out boulder

Hold down LMB to charge into a higher arc to lob it over your friends' heads. Remember that with a bit of practice you can throw rocks at your other rocks and boulders to alter their velocity and trajectory! If your final nut is stolen, you lose the game. 

Good luck!

Scoring:

When you defeat an enemy squirrel, you'll get as many points as you have nuts stored.

Known issues:
  • Please refresh the game between attempts, a bug is causing the game not to reset your score to zero when starting a new game.
  • If at the leaderboard, you can't see your score you just submitted, even if it's top ten - go to main menu and then back to leaderboard and it should've updated correctly!
  • The leaderboard somehow sometimes submit the score without the name, cause unknown. If this happens to you, tell us what  score was yours and we'll put in your name manually!
